Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 53rd overall pick, by Ashburn in 1984...
Injured on 5/26/1985 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 5/2/1987, off John Williams (SYR)...
Earned first career win on 5/14/1987...
Hit first career homerun on 8/30/1987, off Fred Myers (NJ)...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1987...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1988, going 3-0, 0.00...
Traded from Ashburn to Halifax on 7/3/1990 (Going to Ash: 1B H. Anguita, 3B A. Savala, P R. Morris. Going to HAL: P T. Wilkins)...
